infos.value: News from the battlefield, Your Majesty!
Fennes's first division, in pursuit of the enemy, has been completely annihilated.
So it would seem our enemies fight in earnest as well.
There's nothing to worry about. Th' fight's only just getting started.
That is not all, Your Majesty. The enemy's main force has already begun its retreat.
Then they are surely preparing to hole up inside the castle.
In which case, Prince Sterne will no doubt lead their rear guard.
It is said his sword arm is rivaled only by King Oelde himself, and yet the prince has never appeared in battle.
He must be too scared o' me to step foot out on th' battlefield.
That would be fine if it were the case. However...
King Oelde must surely have some scheme in mind.
Your Majesty, it is not Sterne commanding the rear guard, but the leader of «Caelum». A man called Mont.
Prince Mont!? The clawless cub of the lion twins!?
So that swine Oelde plans to keep Sterne in reserve.
If that is the case, then he has assured our victory.
«Solidus», move out! Strike down the enemy ranks, and show no mercy!
The enemy's second division is advancing!
Do not falter! Engage the enemy!
